title: Killyclogher reach Tyrone SFC decider for first time since 2003
content:
Killyclogher are into the final of the Tyrone SFC after a thrilling 0-13 to 0-12 win over Dromore in Healy Park. 
 
Dromore had two men sent off with Colm McCullagh picking up a straight red while Barry Collins had two yellow cards. 
 
Killyclogher led 0-10 to 0-4 at the break but Dromore piled the pressure on in the second half of an exciting affair. 
 
Afterwards, Francis Mooney spoke to the victorious Killyclogher manager Kieran Howe. 
 
SatKieranHowe
source: Highland Radio - Latest Donegal News and Sport
